tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (CD one) (POS 's)) (NN heart))) (NP (CC &) (NP (NP (DT some) (NN laughter)) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (CD one) (POS 's)) (NNS lips))))) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (DT a) (NN sign)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (DT a) (NN person)) (ADVP (RB down) (RB deep)) (VP (VBZ has) (NP (NP (DT a) (ADJP (RB pretty) (JJ good)) (NN grasp)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN #life)))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [sign/NN nmod:in>[heart/NN case>in/IN nmod:poss>[one/CD case>'s/POS]] nsubj>[laughter/NN cc>&/CC det>some/DT nmod:on>[lips/NNS case>on/IN nmod:poss>[one/CD case>'s/POS]]] cop>is/VBZ det>a/DT ccomp>[has/VBZ mark>that/IN nsubj>[person/NN det>a/DT] advmod>[deep/RB advmod>down/RB] dobj>[grasp/NN det>a/DT amod>[good/JJ advmod>pretty/RB] nmod:of>[#life/NN case>of/IN]]] punct>./.]
